scene-001.title: The Mysterious Laboratory
scene-001.body:
You stand in an abandoned laboratory, surrounded by dust and cobwebs. A yellowed photograph hangs on the wall, showing an old man in a white lab coat, his eyes revealing madness and desire.

In the corner of the lab, there's an ancient-looking machine flickering with a faint green light. On the nearby desk lies a notebook with [Time Travel Journal] written on its cover.

You feel dizzy, as if time flows differently here than in the outside world...

scene-002.title: Time Machine Activated
scene-002.body:
You approach the machine, carefully observing its construction. It's a spherical device covered with complex circuits and tubes. In the center is a control panel with several buttons and a year input field.

Suddenly, the machine emits a deep hum, and the green light becomes brighter. A line of text appears on the screen:

[Welcome, Time Traveler. Please enter target year.]

You notice a warning label next to the year input: [Warning: Time paradoxes may cause reality collapse.]

choices.text: Enter 1955 (the year mentioned in the journal)
Give up and leave the laboratory

scene-003.title: Secrets in the Journal
scene-003.body:
You carefully open the yellowed notebook. The first page reads:

[First Experiment Log - March 15, 1985

Today, I finally completed the time machine prototype. In theory, it can send a person to any point in time. But I must warn future users:

1. Do not alter major historical events
2. Do not meet yourself
3. Do not stay for more than 24 hours

Violate these rules at your own risk.

â€”Professor John Smith]

Below are many experiment records. One page has been torn out, leaving only a few words:

[...last time...1955...she's still alive...]

choices.text: Go back to examine the time machine

char-001.name: Alex Chen
char-001.description: A young physicist with deep research into time travel theory. Cautious yet curious by nature.
goals: Uncover the secrets of time travel

char-002.name: John Smith
char-002.description: Mysterious inventor of the time machine, missing for many years. Left behind many unsolved mysteries.
